the instruction to seam it here because this is essentially an i-cord but i and seam with simply don t like making i-cords if you re fine with knitting them then feel free to mattress stitch make that instead for the arms legs and head stem/antennae but this is the method i m using for this pattern so don t feel forced to use i-cords if you re not comfortable with using that technique legs black
